climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: Renewed products look and work like new. These pre-owned products have been inspected and tested by Amazon-qualified suppliers, which typically perform a full diagnostic test, replacement of any defective parts, and a thorough cleaning process. Packaging and accessories may be generic. All products on Amazon Renewed come with a minimum 90-day supplier-backed warranty.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars iPad Air 2 review

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I loved it it works amazing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Worst seller. Do not buy
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my son for Christmas as we fly very soon and with the long flight figured it would be perfect for a 13 year old to keep him occupied. When we went to set it up most of the storage on it is used up by OS and system info. It left 4gb for him to add apps and such. After getting it set up we realized it keeps dying after being removed from charger within ten minutes. We messaged Amazon who told us to talk to sellers. We bought a case and screen protector for this tablet and now can’t return either. The seller told us to simply return it. If we return it now my son would have nothing for the flight as we wouldn’t get the refund in time to buy another tablet. They sent me a picture of a return slip that has no option to save share or print so how do we return it at all? They offered no help not even to send a replacement. So we are stuck with a broken iPad until we finish with our move. Seller is awful. This iPad is awful. I bought a 27” iMac desk top that was renewed 2 years ago and have had no issues should have stuck with that seller. I can’t say enough. DO NOT BUY FROM THIS SELLER!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars SO FAR, SO GOOD. AS EXPECTED.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Ordered this refurbished iPad Air 2 for my girlfriends birthday. It has only been 5 hours of her having the product and I’ll update this review in a week or so.AS OF NOW-iPad is 100% unlocked, signed into Apple ID perfectly fine, it updated to the most current update being 14.4 successfully, restored from old back up perfectly. There is NO lagging everything is effective, finger print works, connects to wifi, downloads all apps she needed being Cricut and procreate. Battery was on 60 when received she charged it up and it’s been perfect with the battery life. It does have a crack on the screen but she’s so happy she hardly notices it. I’ll update later with a review on performance in a week.Don’t be discouraged by bad reviews, take your chance. I have a MacBook Air I have refurbished for almost a year now and I will always take my chances.Thank you company and Amazon!apple pen and the keyboard do not come with this iPad I ordered separately via Amazon as well!1+ month UPDATE:bought the ipad feb 7th - a little over a month and it is truly amazing. the battery life is OK. it doesn't hold a charge for long but it charges so it works. still updates with new system updates, downloads apps, connects to wifi, its quick. bought a case to go along with it and you cant see the TINY scratches it comes with.if you want to be satisfied, you'll find a way to be.

reviews.reviewerName: love the ipad got it for my boyfriend he loves it aswell
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just as described
reviews.reviewText: iPad came quickly. Only charges well with proper cord. Tried to charge with another iPhone charger I had and it didn’t work. Which is totally fine. I just didn’t know how specific these things can be. Not a lot of storage space. But perfect for my needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Refurbished with a warranty = not a gamble! It's beautiful and like new!
reviews.reviewText: I was worried about buying a refurbished iPad, but I decided to take the chance. (The warranty helps ease concerns.) The iPad arrived very quickly & like new. The difference between the iPad Air & Air 2 is very slight. The display is slightly better & the system seems to operate more quickly. I'm very pleased with this purchase and the savings, and the only downfall was that the charger did not work at all. Fortunately I already have 2 chargers, so this was not a huge issue for me, but I would suggest the chargers should be tested before shipping out to customers who may not be as fortunate to have a spare.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I thought you had put a new iPad in the package I got wow no scratches bangs or dings thank you nice item no faults I will have no problems recommending you

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 29, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This is a great item, so much better than buying new.performs brilliantly, does everything we wanted from an ipad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: When this iPad came the package was open and it didn’t look pleasant or new. This iPad looks like it’s been used by someone. I didn’t expect that Amazon would do this kind of things because it should always be looking nice . The iPad also has some issues and it doesn’t charge very well from the start although new iPads always charge quicker, this one doesn’t.I brought an iPad from Amazon last time and this didn’t happen, everything worked very fine however this one doesn’t.I’m very disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Was a little weary ordering an iPad that had been previously used but the item I received was in absolute fantastic condition.Could not fault the transaction and the seller’s communication and reply’s were the very best I’ve experienced.Needles to say I’ve since purchased another for my daughter.Highly Recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 14, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The iPad wasn’t charged on arrival so had to wait fir it to charge before actually using it. However once this was done everything worked well. It is currently being used as a drawing tablet for my daughter but I guess if you need it for more than that then buy one with more than 16GB of storage.
